name: RX Racing 2022 Pro
description:
RX Racing 2022 Pro is an arcade rallycross game where you can drive the drivers of the year 2022 in different categories. The goal is very simple, you take a driver and try to win the race .



New features :

Game :

- new interface to select the different game modes

- you can play with two different controllers ( only during the race )

- you can choose 8 different graphics from Very Low to Master

- add two new championships : RCenter and Finland

- ARC and INRX become E-ARC and E-INRX : two new electric championships

Track :

- add three new tracks : Dreu , Strengnas and Hel

- add of a podium

- more credible walls

Car :

- new car for Gronolm in RNordic

- new car and team in E-INRX

- new electric sound for electric car

- new livery for Godfree

Race :

- 5 different spotters

- you can stall on the grid

- new start on the grid for E-INRX

- the other drivers are faster

- some drivers have an ultra-aggressive ability : when they want to overtake, they do so, even if it is to push you or other drivers off the track



Feature :

3 Modes : Time Attack , Race and Season

Time Attack :

Train on one of the 28 circuits for improve yourself or play on the different playgrounds that are available on some circuits.

Race :

There are more than 40 pilots who are divided into more than 20 teams. So choose a driver and try to lead him to victory.

Season :

- Season 2022 of E-INRX 9 drivers , 4 teams and 9 tracks

Race with 5-6 cars Season 7 races

- Season 2022 of UK Rallycross 7 drivers , 6 teams and 7 tracks

Race with 6-7 cars Season 4 races

- Season 2022 of RNordic 12 drivers 9 teams and 9 tracks

Race with 5-6 cars Season 4 races

- Season of RCenter

Race with 5-6 cars Season 2 races

- Season of Finland

Race with 5-6 cars Season 2 races

- Season 2021 of SARX 8 drivers 5 teams and 4 tracks

Race with 7-8 cars Season 3 races

- Season 2022 of E-ARC 13 drivers 4 teams and 11 tracks

Race with 7-8 cars Season 5 races ARC Classic 4 races

- 8 Songs

Only

- keyboards and mouse

- Controller

This game includes :

- Fake names - Fake tracks - Fake teams - Fake cars
